Title: Authorizes NYC to impose a fee on motor vehicles from states which do not cooperate with the enforcement of certain traffic laws
Summary: Authorizes the imposition of a fifty dollar fee on vehicles entering NYC which are registered in states which do not cooperate with New York in the enforcement of traffic infractions through the use of photo-monitoring devices or signal monitoring systems.
LawCode: Add ยง516-c, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to fees charged to certain motorists
